summary: An outrageous, over-the-top spoof, FDR: American Badass is the untold true story of our country's greatest monster-hunting president!
cast: Barry Bostwick|Lin Shaye|Bruce McGill|Ray Wise|Kevin Sorbo|William Mapother|Paul Ben-Victor|Keri Lynn Pratt|Ross Patterson|Deon Richmond|Rob Lathan|Robin Sydney|Matt Winston|Richard Riehle|Robert R. title: FDR: American Badass!
